Name: Mercenary Review Board
Details: Formed in 2789 by ComStar founder Jerome Blake, the Mercenary Review Board (or MRB) was established to all ComStar to serve as brokers between mercenaries and their employers.  This allows contracts to be bonded and help assures both parties that the agreed upon termed are followed.  The planet Galatea, the so-called "Mercenary's Star" became the center of mercenary trade in the Inner Sphere and was the primary location of the MRB.
